Nerangs.ab: Y7.2 (mss. 2101, 2106. Cf. 83 NP būy be ātaš dādan (at the end of Y7.1):
aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm bōy dō bār ō ī ātaxš dādan hauruuata amərətāta ...
"Between aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm and hauruuata amərətāta ... he has to give twice bōy to the fire."

ab.ab: Wizirgerd ī Dēnīg (Sanjana, 1848 p. 74) on the collection of the fires for the Warahrām fire, the day Srōš, month Frawardin:
ud pad ān rōz ī Srōš pad gāh hāwan yašt-ēw yašt ī Srōš bē yazišn ud pad ān yazišn ī Srōš pad abar ān gyāg aṣ̌aiia daδąmi ǰāmag pad pēš ātaxš abāyēd burdan čē zōt ān ātaxš nē wēnēd.

"And at the day of Srōš, at the time of hāwan, he should performe one Yasna, a Yasna to Srōš; and at this Yasna to Srō̐s, at the beginning of the point (where it is recited) aṣ̌aiia daδąmi, it is necessary to bring the vessel in front of the fire, so the zōt cannot see this fire.
